title: U.S. Proposes Ban on Connected Vehicles Using Chinese and Russian Tech
description: The U.S. Department of Commerce (DoC) said it's proposing a ban on the import or sale of connected vehicles that integrate software and hardware made by foreign adversaries, particularly that of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and Russia.
